channel.title: Posts on Jonathan's Work Examples
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Jonathan's Work Examples

item.title: DevOps Vagrant Box
item.description: In this article I’ll describe a successful solution to a lingering problem we faced: Getting “traditional” Ops people working with modern infrastructure tooling.

item.title: AWS provisioning with Python boto
item.description: In this post I describe an AWS provisioning system using Python boto to provision cloud resources for a company transitioning from a traditional ITIL model (with separate Engineering and Operations teams) to a more modern “DevOps” way of working.
